content.webTitle: Van der Vaart confident the Dutch will not argue

fields.headline: Van der Vaart confident the Dutch will not argue
fields.bodyText: Rafael van der Vaart believes the Holland coach Marco van Basten has created a superb atmosphere and that the team can go far because of that. "The team spirit has really improved and it's very special to be part of this team," he said. "He is a young coach and he is close to the squad. He knows exactly what we need."
